data.label: Koshi Tappu Wildlife Reserve
data.description: Koshi Tappu Wildlife Reserve stands today as a successful testimony of nature conservation in South Asia. It is the first of its kind.

data.label: Bardiya National Park (2 nights 3 days Jungle Safari)
data.description: The Royal Bardiya National Park, situated in the mid-far Western region, is the largest and most unspoiled wilderness area in Nepal.

data.label: Bardiya National Park (3 nights 4 days Jungle Safari)
data.description: The Royal Bardiya National Park, situated in the mid-far Western region, is the largest and most unspoiled wilderness area in Nepal.

data.label: Chitwan National Park (4 days outside park Safari)
